mainTitle4: We help businesses achieve effective results through innovative, simple, and convenient digital solutions
mainTitle5: Create progressive technical solutions for optimizing and automating business processes
solutionCreditConveyorDesc: A comprehensive solution for automating the business processes of personal lending, focused on scalability, flexibility, and high performance, based on a microservice architecture.
solutionCreditBrokerDesc: A service offering the possibility to purchase goods on installment or by applying for a loan with the ability to submit applications to multiple financial organizations simultaneously.
solutionCustomSolutionsDesc: The process of creating unique and individually tailored software according to the customer's specific needs.
aboutText1: We have been working in the market since 2023 and in a short time have built a sustainable ecosystem of digital solutions in the lending sector. Our platform is represented in more than 20 cities of Kazakhstan and unites 300+ partners across the country.
aboutText2: The company develops and implements 2 proprietary products that provide complete automation of the entire lending cycle - from application submission to decision-making and support. The entire system is 100% proprietary development, which allows flexible adaptation to customer and regulatory requirements.
aboutText3: Today, the team consists of 40+ employees, and our solutions are already used in 20+ GovTech projects. Thanks to business process automation, clients achieve up to 50% optimization of operating expenses (OPEX).
aboutText4: The quality and reliability of our products is confirmed by a high level of user satisfaction - NPS is 93%.

creditConveyor.title: Credit Conveyor
creditConveyor.subtitle: – a comprehensive solution for automating the business processes of personal lending, focused on scalability, flexibility, and high performance, based on a microservice architecture
points: Automated generation of a complete set of credit documentation for applications
Universal APIs for connecting credit organizations
Increase in Time 2 Market speed of launching new products to the market
Modular solution – independent processes that can be connected both collectively and separately
Product catalog - rapid modification and launch of new products

benefits.headline: By choosing SapaTech's Credit Conveyor, you get:
benefitsList: Automation of the entire lending cycle
Reduction of review time by 3 times

creditBroker.title: Credit Broker
creditBroker.subtitle: – a service offering the possibility to purchase goods on installment or by applying for a loan with the ability to submit applications to multiple financial organizations simultaneously
points: Omnichannel process — flexible and easily adaptable processes
Convenient customer journey — loan application processing within 5 minutes
Intuitive interface — ability to self-administer processes
Government services — integration with government data sources, biometrics, electronic signature
Connecting credit organizations — universal API for connecting
Full cycle of development and support of functionality — high speed of launching new products to the market

benefits.headline: By choosing SapaTech's Credit Broker, you get:
benefitsList: Access to partners without expanding the network
Integration with government data sources, biometrics, electronic signature

Analytics and forecasting based on your financial data
Convenient integration with banks and financial institutions
